attributes.action: In event of a Citizen Army,  MPs are the first to be drafted for the frontline
attributes.additional_details: Although the armed forces minister, James Heappey said, Any talk of the UK introducing conscription to the army if NATO goes to war with Russia is "nonsense" lack of trust in this any most past parties does not instil confidence that normal people will be forced to fight as of this we are asking that in the event of a "Citizen Army" MPs are the first to be called up to train and fight to show they are at least willing to not only run the country but defend it.
attributes.background: To instil trust in the public that in the event of a "Citizen Army" that parliament and MPs will do there duty and be the first to go.

rejection.details: The Government has not announced any plans to introduce conscription, so we're not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do.
